reviews.title: Wow...
reviews.comment: Billing me 56.96 to my account to \"play on normal \" how about no!  Uninstall!  Worst app.ever! I didn\'t even get to play it,because it kept trying to charge me! >_<
reviews.author: azalia Villarreal

reviews.title: Don\'t get this game!
reviews.comment: It won\'t even let me play and stuff on it cost over $50.00 ! Worst game ever!
